comments:
20030930 on 1001 with the current contents of HEAD for core and the UI

When you create a file using Core it is possible to get an 
AssertionFailedException.

STEPS
1) Load the core and ui modules from HEAD
2)Run the UITestSuite - this problem will not happen on its own
3) You will get the following exception
